      • setInitialBoxesRandomly

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> setInitialBoxesRandomly(int numberOfRandomBoxes)
        Sets a board with random boxes.
        Parameters:
        numberOfRandomBoxes - number of boxes to generate
        Returns:
        list of generated boxes
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If numberOfRandomBoxes is bigger or equals capacity of the board.
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If any rectangle was added.

      • setInitialBoxes

        Sets the board with given boxes.
        Parameters:

      • addRectangle

        public void addRectangle(java.awt.Point box1,
                         java.awt.Point box2,
                         java.lang.Integer playerNumber)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Validates the player's move. Updates a state of the board.
        Parameters:
        box1 - With box2 makes the rectangle. Boxes must be stuck to each other and their indexes have to fit inside board.
        box2 - Same as box1
        playerNumber - Number of player
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - On playerNumber is greater than 2
        or points are not stuck to each other
        or a box was already put
        or a box does not fit into boundaries of the board.
